errorMessage.type:
type ONLY_FOR_FORMAT =
  | string
  | number
  | boolean
  | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>

errorMessage.description: The form control error message to use.

helperMessage.type:
type ONLY_FOR_FORMAT =
  | string
  | number
  | boolean
  | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
  | Iterable<ReactNode>
  | ReactPortal
helperMessage.description: The form control helper message to use.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isReplace.description: If `true`, switch between helper message and error message using isInvalid.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.
